meaningMnemonic: Reaching your <radical>ear</radical> is the <radical>sound</radical> of a <radical>drunkard</radical> who can’t find <kanji>employment</kanji>. You hear him before you see him because he’s behind some trash cans. Being a drunkard, he’s like, super wasted and just kind of rambling to himself, making strange sounds. No wonder he can’t find employment.
readingMnemonic: Since this guy is such a pathetic drunkard, it comes as no <reading>shock</reading> (しょく) that he can’t find <kanji>employment</kanji>. If he did find employment, I would be filled with both shock and awe.
